p: In the study by Muraina et al. ( 192), A. occidentale leaf extract (10,000 μg/mL) was used against Mycoplasma spp., using the broth microdilution method. The antibiotic tylosin (1,280 μg/mL) was used as a positive control and acetone as a negative control. The authors obtained a significant result for the extract as an anti-mycoplasm product (MIC = 310 μg/mL).
